verses.roman:
caitanya-prabhura mahimā kahibāra tare
kṛṣṇera mahimā kahi kariyā vistāre

synonyms: caitanya-prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahimā—the glories; kahibāra tare—for the purpose of speaking; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; mahimā—the glories; kahi—I speak; kariyā—doing; vistāre—in expansion.
translation: Just to enunciate the glories of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, I have tried to describe the glories of Śrī Kṛṣṇa in detail.
